Articles.Content:
Hello, I have finally gotten round to posting a welcome message in this place!

However I do have a question that is nagging me - how do I use Imgur and Hastebin (for pictures and logs)?

Howdy, pardner!

The code for imgur albums is [noparse]

Javascript is disabled. View full album
[/noparse]

For all other images, it is [noparse][/noparse]

If you want to add a linked picture, it is [noparse]picture URL here (no uploads from your computer!!)[/noparse]
Hello hello! And yup, Dman got it covered for you.
